title: Creatures Foley Sounds
description: 1270 high-quality and realistic sounds of creature's bites, steps, falling, scratches and wings flapping.
longDescription:
🎧Preview(Youtube)

🎧Preview(SoundCloud)

📃List of sounds

It is impossible to imagine any game without high-quality sound. Every movement and event should be accompanied by sounds that add depth and soul to your projects. TIRIF Studio specializes in the development of high-quality and diverse sounds for any kind and genre of projects.


In this asset you will find 1270 high-quality sounds of:


  • Bite(Chunky(Medium, Small), Crunchy(Large, Medium, Small), Tough(Large, Medium, Small))
  • Body_Fall(Dirt, Grass, Gravel, Mud, Sand, Snow, Stone, Water, Wood in Large/Medium/Small versions)
  • Scratch(Large, Medium, Small)
  • Step(Dirt, Grass, Gravel, Mud, Sand, Snow, Stone, Water, Wood in Large/Medium/Small versions)
  • Wing(Feather, Leather in Large/Medium/Small versions and Insect in Medium/Small versions)


Important:

 ● Please leave a review if you bought our product

 ● Feel free to ask any question

 ● There is no exclusive license, you can use our sounds in your commercial games
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Waves: 1270

Number of Audio Cues: 1270

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz, 16 bit

Do Sound FX loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 44:38

Supported Development Platforms:

 Windows: Yes

 Mac: Yes
